20 Years...
 
From CS 1.0 to 1.3 then 1.6, now I play this game again in CS;GO. 
Oh how the time flies and the graphics improve. From a MOD in HL2 to becoming a renown game on its own.
The very definition of classic tactical FPS.

Remembering my childhood days dominating locally and now getting rekt internationally. Still fun. Up to this day, even if its now Free-to-Play. Although it invites toxicity and cancerous community. It is still the game we will always come back to just to have fun or get competitive.
В целом игра хорошая, если в нее не играть.
